product_name: The North Face Mondaze Laptop Pack - 2012 Closeout
long_description: You're familiar with the Monday daze or Monday haze. The North Face brings you the Mondaze laptop pack that carries all the necessities you need to get through Monday and the rest of the work week. 2 zippered main exterior pockets; 1 pocket is padded and carries up to a 15 in. laptop. Exterior tricot-lined zip stash pocket. 2 vertical zippered stash pockets; side bungee water bottle pockets. Breathable, padded back panel; FlexVent(TM) injection-molded shoulder straps ensure comfortable carrying; also features an adjustable sternum strap. Compression straps cinch The North Face Mondaze pack for easy carrying. From The North Face Campus Collection, this trend-setting pack features retro aesthetics, a contemporary design and durable materials and construction. Closeout.
short_description: You're familiar with the Monday daze or Monday haze. The North Face brings you the Mondaze laptop pack that carries all the necessities you need to get through Monday and the rest of the work week.
